title: Critical Response: Glasgow Compressor & Regional Warnings

items.action: Immediate dispatch of technician for compressor repair/replacement.
Close door and inspect door seals/alignment to prevent further temperature rise.
Investigate warning status and monitor temperature stability.

summary: Action plan to address the compressor failure in Glasgow and high-temperature warnings in Manchester and Birmingham.

title: Fleet Recovery & Maintenance Plan

items.action: Immediate technician dispatch for compressor repair/replacement.
Relocate all perishable inventory to backup storage to prevent loss.
Inspect for frost buildup and verify door seal integrity.
Monitor power consumption for anomalies compared to healthy units.

summary: Urgent response required for compressor failure in Glasgow and preventative maintenance for marginal temperature performance in Birmingham.

title: Emergency Recovery & Maintenance Plan - Jan 17

items.action: Dispatch emergency technician for compressor repair and unit diagnostic
Relocate all perishable inventory to functional cold storage/backup units
Investigate Warning status and check for frost buildup or door seal integrity
Perform a fleet-wide power efficiency audit once critical repairs are complete

summary: Urgent response plan to address the compressor failure in Glasgow (FREEZER_003) and the warning status in Birmingham (FREEZER_004) to prevent stock loss and restore fleet temperature standards.
